problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- Rscript may not be installed (exit code 127 indicates missing executable).
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- Replication data files (replication_data/*.rda) may be MISSING.
- Check file existence before attempting to load: ls -la replication_data/
- If data files or R are missing, report as environmental limitation.
- Do not attempt to install R packages if Rscript is unavailable.
